title: Venture Capital Firms - Make Sure Your Approaches Are Right For The Fund Raise (Mireille Varieur)
text: By Mireille Varieur Oct 23, 2015 Here is the trick, if you are going to raise venture capital for the first time. The first advice comes as a denial. It says, not to sit before venture capitalists as long as possible. These VCs are not easy to go with, whereas not that difficult as well to handle. It is just to save you (as an amateur business planner) from unforeseen loss risks. However, it is not an obligatory form of advice to strictly follow. Based on your needs, you can easily proceed to raise funds through venture capital firms, but in order to earn benefits, you better get on with these below laid ploys:1. Initially, you have to prepare for the venture capital campaign. There is always a challenge to look after, though you can help this part with newly generated tools. Your message should be loud and clear to the investors. Once the investors start falling for you, you turn out to be the luckiest one on earth.2. Keep your eyes open for 24*7 activities. There are some fake investors roaming with value-added venture capital services, what turn out to be nightmare if you fail to detect it at the initial stage. However, the case can be reversed and positive as well. The reputed investors do offer value-added services what would more include managerial guidance followed by enlarging contacts.3. Be whatever your service or product is, just make sure they are convincing both for the investors and end-customers. To make it look persuasive to the investors, you are supposed to come up with unique message dissemination idea. If possible, try to convince the investors by demonstrating your product or service as a major changer in the society. Something what people have long been waiting for.4. Make sure you know your business better than anyone else. When you start presenting your business to the investors, do ensure that your business reflects right through your body gesture and speech. Try to present the objectives of your service clearer to them; it would help you gain success easily. 5. Your potential investors would always wish to meet your management team, as they very well that a management team is the backbone of any organization. Thus, you better be conscious while hiring management executives for your business. 6. And, before you go for all these, know your investors' preference for business sector and business stage selection. Investors do nurture preference for business sector. Make sure, your approached investor does include your business sector. On the other hand, know their preference for the stage. As for example, there are seed stage, growth stage and early stage. Thus, you have to make sure that your approached investors do second any of these. About the Author Mireille Varieur earned expertises in writing articles and blogs of Venture capital firms and related topics. He possesses in-depth knowledge of the topic and gained huge appreciations from readers. Rating:
